issue.title: [CF 166] New Icon Type: Standing in Fire
issue.body:
This icon type will display whenever you take damage from, or have a debuff active that is caused by, fire, or other harmful effects that can be avoided by not standing in them. Presets will be added for PvP, as well as each raiding tier (starting with T11).


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #166 | Raw

comments.body:
After thinking about this a little bit more, I have decided not to implement this icon type. This is something that is probably better left to boss mods. If this ticket receives +20 votes, then I will implement it, but otherwise, I will not.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
